content:
Hi,

Not globally, but you can set this for each mailbox: Account settings -> Reading mail -> Always show images.

Regards, Balázs
creator: meskobalazs

content: Where will I find this setting? I do t see it.
creator: mikenugent3

content:
Hi,

You'll want to click the three horizontal lines at the top left corner of the app, then the gear at the bottom left corner.

Then, select your account (xxx@xxx.xxx) under "Accounts". Select "Reading Mail", then "Always Show Images". You should be able to choose to show images from contacts or from anyone.

Hope this helps! A
